entry.title: Catamari
entry.summary: Catgirl and I visit Panther and Diane to get big
entry.content:
Everyone loves Panther so much! He meowed a bunch to go on a patrol, but we needed to wait for Catgirl and Diane to finish the Katamari level, or else he wouldn't leave the doorway.

[[carousel:label=Panther Friend; media/images/panther-catgirl-catlady.avif|I love kitties so much; media/images/eloise-panther-couch-1.avif|Me and Panther; media/images/eloise-panther-couch-2.avif|Me and Panther ðŸ˜º;]] 3 images

Poor Panther has lost his hearing it seems. I'm so glad he still seems like a happy cat. Maybe his hearing loss is related to him wanting to hang out with everyone, so he could be alterted to any sort of interesting events that he otherwise might not hear.

Katamari looks really fun but I didn't play too much. Catgirl got me real loopy, and I had trouble reading the text on the screen, and also got very distracted by Panther.

Diane later commented on how skinny Panther looks in the photos and how she misses her sack of potatoes which made me pretty sad, but I'm glad he's still hanging out with us and being dopey. I think it's important to be dopey.

Kitten Kartwheel

At the end, we were visited by the kittens who were happy to display their acrobatics. [[video:kitten-cartwheel]]

entry.title: Big Baby Panther
entry.content:
The Babby Hold

I had been catsitting Panther, and he kept trying to find a spot to hang out while I was working. He kept sitting in weird corners on top of cables, and didn't want to sit on cushions for some reason. I thought maybe he would sit in my lap if I had pillow and awkwardly hoisted him up, and it was an accident that he ended up in this position. I didn't even have my phone on me, so this was actually taken with an ipad(?) I had lying around.

[[video:panther-baby-hold]]

entry.title: Panther wakes up
entry.summary: One of my favorite videos of him
entry.content:
A long time ago when I was catsitting. The sound when he shakes his head is amazing. It takes him a while to find the kibbles.

[[video:panther-wake-up-to-kibbles]]
